reviews.content: The liquid eye shadow is amazing!
You should definitely try the pressed foundation. It was a perfect match!
The loose mineral eyeshadow is fabbbbb
I wouldn't try the the gel liner, it was just to dry after only using it once
the lip gloss was pretty sticky, buy at your own risk
Try the lip crayons, you won't regret it. Soo colorful and vibrant :)
love love this b smudged eyeshadow
this lip gloss is the bomb
